document.discussion_title: A Sneak Peek Into How “The Queen” Spends Mother’s Day – Feisty Frugal & Fabulous
document.topic_text: Facebook Celebrate Mother’s Day and treat your mom like the queen she is this year with the British Rose collection from The Body Shop. These organic roses are hand-picked, air-dried and then infused into fresh mountain water to create a quintessentially feminine scent. The collection captures the true beauty of roses, revealing a healthy glow and petal-soft skin. Give mom the perfect pampering present this Mother’s Day with a variety of gift sets from The Body Shop. British Rose Exfoliating Soap 100g (SRP $6.00), British Rose Instant Glow Body Butter 200ml (SRP $21.00), British Rose Petal-Soft Skin Hand Cream 30ml (SRP $10.00) 100ml (SRP $21.00), British Rose Eau de Toilette 100ml (SRP $20.00), British Rose Petal-Soft Bath Foam 250ml (SRP $12.00), British Rose Shower Gel 250ml (SRP $10.00), British Rose Instant Glow Body Essence 250ml (SRP $21.00), British Rose Exfoliating Gel Body Scrub 250ml (SRP $22.00) If you’ve ever wondered what it might really be like celebrating Mother’s Day with the royal family, this latest ad campaign from The Body Shop, gives us all a glimpse into what it may be like (it’s so cute!): Now your mom (or you, I am absolutely not above buying treats for myself to take care of ME for Mother’s Day) can indulge like a royal with this limited edition Royal Tote from The Body Shop. Valued at over $105 in product, this tote includes: Satsuma Shower Gel
